name: @commercetools/sdk-middleware-http
description: Middleware for http requests, to use with @commercetools/sdk-client
author: Nicola Molinari <nicola.molinari@commercetools.com> (https://github.com/emmenko)

scripts.dist: npm run build:umd && npm run build:umd:min
scripts.build:umd: cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack --config ../../webpack.config.js --output-library CommercetoolsSdkMiddlewareHttp --output-library-target umd src/index.js dist/commercetools-sdk-middleware-http.js
scripts.build:umd:min: cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack -p --config ../../webpack.config.js --output-library CommercetoolsSdkMiddlewareHttp --output-library-target umd src/index.js dist/commercetools-sdk-middleware-http.min.js
